includedAssets.title: Last Days Of Summer
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - Last Days Of Summer
includedAssets.synopsis: The Dillon Panthers look ahead to the new season, hungry to continue their success. Former coach Taylor, meanwhile, settles into his job at TMU.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Dillon Panthers look ahead to the new season, hungry to continue their success. Former coach Taylor, meanwhile, settles into his job at TMU.

includedAssets.title: Bad Ideas
includedAssets.synopsis: It's the first day back at school and, while Saracen watches his world come crashing down, Landry tries to make sense of his. Things take their toll on Tami as well.

includedAssets.synopsis: Riggins tags along when Street heads to Mexico, while Coach Taylor reaches a decision. Plus, there's a big development in a police search.

includedAssets.title: Let's Get It On
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - Let's Get It On
includedAssets.synopsis: Taylor returns to Dillon and is reunited with his family and the Panthers. In Mexico, Riggins and Lyla try to talk Street out of surgery.

includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep6 - How Did I Get Here?
includedAssets.synopsis: Landry forces his dad into a tough situation when he comes clean. The Taylor household, meanwhile, is stirred up by Tami's sister.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Both the Panthers and Tami face a tough time adjusting to their new reality with Taylor now assistant coach at TMU. Second season of the acclaimed American football drama starring Kyle Chandler and Connie Britton.
